jobDescription: Responsibilities · Collaborate with Stakeholders to Define and Document Data Requirements  · Perform data profiling, data analysis, data mapping  · Develop business rules spreadsheets (BRSs) to document data movement/data transformation rules  · Develop System Requirements document ,Requirements traceability matrix (RTM).  · Lead and support change control on baselined requirements.  · Work with developers, data modelers, testers and business area SMEs to support development, system testing, UAT  · Provide assistance and advice to business users in the effective use of applications and information technology. Skills 10+ Years of Software Development  Minimum 7+ Years of System Analysis and Requirement Gathering of business applications and software development lifecycle  Strong Analytical Thinking  Strong Attention to Detail  RapidSQL knowledge is a MUST  Knowledge in understanding the SQL table structure, Queries and data models.  Business Knowledge – mortgage lifecycle, mortgage sourcing, mortgage servicing, credit risk management, and finance/accounting.  Superior oral and written communication skills. This includes informal verbal, informal written, formal written, and document organization. Ability to format professional looking documents that can be given to business customers and auditors.  Demonstrated ability to be self-directed once given a high level task - able to work with a degree of ambiguity, able to research and solve complex issues with limited guidance day-to-day.
